TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SdkResultFactory extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供给 的抽象接口类，用于创建指示成功/失败的 对象。

span.span: An abstract interface class provided to to create an object indicating success / failure.

public abstract Microsoft.Build.Framework.SdkResult IndicateFailure (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> errors, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> warnings = default);

param.name: errors
param.span: SDK 无法解析的错误/原因。

span.span: Errors / reasons the SDK could not be resolved.

param.span: 如果没有其他 SdkResolvers 可以指示成功，则记录为生成错误。

span.span: Will be logged as a build error if no other SdkResolvers were able to indicate success.

summary.span: 创建用于指示解析 SDK 失败的 对象。

span.span: Create an object indicating failure resolving the SDK.

summary.span: 创建指示成功解析了 SDK 的 对象。

span.span: Create an object indicating success resolving the SDK.

Public Overridable Function IndicateSuccess (paths As IEnumerable(Of String), version As String, Optional propertiesToAdd As IDictionary(Of String, String) = Nothing, Optional itemsToAdd As IDictionary(Of String, SdkResultItem) = Nothing, Optional warnings As IEnumerable(Of String) = Nothing) As SdkResult

param.span: 应导入的 SDK 路径

span.span: SDK paths which should be imported

param.name: propertiesToAdd
param.span: 要在计算中设置的属性

span.span: Properties to set in the evaluation
Items to add to the evaluation

param.name: warnings
param.span: 解析过程中显示的可选警告。

span.span: Optional warnings to display during resolution.

summary.span: 创建指示成功的 对象。

remarks.span: 此重载允许返回任何数字 (零个、一个或多个要返回的 SDK 路径) 。

span.span: This overload allows any number (zero, one, or many) of SDK paths to be returned.

remarks.span: 这表示 "成功" 结果可能无法解析为任何 Sdk。

span.span: This means a "successful" result may not resolve to any SDKs.

remarks.span: 解析程序还可以提供属性或项以将信息传递给生成。

span.span: The resolver can also supply properties or items to communicate information to the build.

remarks.span: 这可能会使解析程序无法在不进行硬故障评估的情况下进行解析，而不会对评估进行修复，从而使其他组件更合适的操作 (例如，安装可选工作负荷或下载 NuGet Sdk) 。

span.span: This can allow resolvers to report SDKs that could not be resolved without hard-failing the evaluation, which can allow other components to take more appropriate action (for example, installing optional workloads or downloading NuGet SDKs).
